item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq fall after a warm inflation report, decline in tech shares: Live updates
item.description: Stocks wavered Thursday as investors digested a hotter-than-expected producer price index reading for November.

item.title: More stocks that are adopting MicroStrategy's bitcoin yield strategy
item.description: More and more bitcoin miners are starting to undertake a strategy harnessed by MicroStrategy, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: India's central bank has a new governor. Three experts reveal what they'd do in his shoes
item.description: The move to replace Reserve Bank of India Governor Shaktikanta Das with Sanjay Malhotra appears a calculated way to address the weakness in India's ec...

item.title: Europe stocks close lower after European Central Bank makes quarter-point rate cut
item.description: European markets closed lower Thursday, having shifted between modest losses and gains following the European Central Bank's latest rate cut.

item.title: Trump rings bell at NYSE to cheers of 'USA' as Wall Street CEOs, business leaders look on
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump, who seeks to attract and boost business in the U.S., was greeted with enthusiasm from the NYSE crowd.
